author: BBC Sport
description: Tottenham boss Mauricio Pochettino says Harry Kane is "one of the best strikers in the world" and Tottenham can keep their best players.
title: Harry Kane: Tottenham striker one of world's best, says Mauricio Pochettino

author: talkSPORT
description: Harry Kane was born to score goals. The Tottenham striker moved ahead of Romelu Lukaku in the Premier League scoring charts after bagging four goals against Leicester City – taking his tally to 26 for the season. And the 23-year-old has the Golden Boot firmly in his sights ahead of the final day of the campaign this weekend. Kane faces already relegated Hull on Sunday, while scoring rivals Lukaku and Alexis Sanchez – on 24 and 23 goals – face off at the Emirates.
title: 'Harry Kane: The Three Season Wonder' - Fans react as Tottenham striker takes charge of Golden Boot race

author: talkSPORT
description: Harry Kane was born to score goals. The Tottenham striker moved ahead of Romelu Lukaku in the Premier League scoring charts after bagging four goals against Leicester City – taking his tally to 26 for the season. And the 23-year-old has the Golden Boot firmly in his sights ahead of the final day of the campaign this weekend. Kane faces already relegated Hull on Sunday, while scoring rivals Lukaku and Alexis Sanchez – on 24 and 23 goals – face off at the Emirates.
title: 'Harry Kane: The Three Season Wonder' - Fans react as Tottenham striker takes charge of Golden Boot race

author: talkSPORT
description: Ruthless Harry Kane struck four goals as Tottenham dismantled Leicester 6-1.  The England forward's haul moved him two ahead of Romelu Lukaku in the race for the Premier League's golden boot with 26 goals ahead of Sunday's season-finale at Hull. Son Heung-min also scored twice at the King Power Stadium as Spurs continued to shrug off any disappointment following Chelsea's title win. The visitors were untouchable as they sealed their 13th win in their last 16 games in all competitions, having already cemented second place.
title: Leicester 1-6 Tottenham: Harry Kane bags four goals to take charge of Golden Boot race

author: FourFourTwo
description: Several of Tottenham's stars are being coveted by Europe's big guns, but Harry Kane insists there will be no fire sale.
title: Kane expects Tottenham 'family' to stay together

author: BBC Sport
description: Harry Kane scores four times as a dominant Tottenham hammer Leicester City to secure their 25th league win of the season.
title: Leicester City 1-6 Tottenham Hotspur

author: FourFourTwo
description: Mauricio Pochettino is not worried at the prospect of losing leading Premier League goalscorer Harry Kane to another club after this season.
title: Kane has no reason to leave Tottenham, insists Pochettino

author: FourFourTwo
description: Tottenham's Harry Kane leads the Golden Boot standings and he has told his rivals that he plans to stay there by the end of the final day.
title: I want four more! Kane fires warning to Hull City as Tottenham star closes on Golden Boot

description: Tottenham Hotspur hat seine starke Saison auch im vorletzten Saisonspiel bei Leicester City bestätigt und dank Harry Kane einen Kantersieg gefeiert.
title: Fußball: Tottenham Hotspur besiegt Leicester 6:1
